channel.title: CVE Feed for GeoNode -- geonode

item.title: CVE-2023-40017|2024-10-02T18:19:26.883Z -- geonode -- geonode
item.description: GeoNode is an open source platform that facilitates the creation, sharing, and collaborative use of geospatial data. In versions 3.2.0 through 4.1.2, the endpoint `/proxy/?url=` does not properly protect against server-side request forgery. This allows an attacker to port scan internal hosts and request information from internal hosts. A patch is available at commit a9eebae80cb362009660a1fd49e105e7cdb499b9.
